name: Hateful Conduct
description: We don't allow hateful conduct - direct attacks against people on the basis of protected characteristics (PCs): race, ethnicity, national origin, disability, religious affiliation, caste, sexual orientation, sex, gender identity, and serious disease. We also protect refugees, migrants, immigrants and asylum seekers from severe attacks (Tier 1).

full.name: Ethnicity
full.description: Common ancestral, social, cultural, or national experience

full.name: National Origin/Nationality
full.description: Country, continent, or region of origin/citizenship

full.name: Caste
full.description: Social hierarchy based on traditional occupations (Brahman, Kshatriya, Vaishya, Sudra, Dalits)

full.name: Serious Disease
full.description: Serious illness including cancer, HIV/AIDS, STIs

quasi.name: Migrants
quasi.description: People who cross international borders for residency

quasi.name: Immigrants
quasi.description: People establishing residency in new country

protectedCharacteristics.age_rule: Age is protected ONLY when combined with a PC or QPC

fully_protected.description: Protected from ALL tiers of attack
combinations: PC + words indicating most of PC group (e.g., Most Muslims)
PC + location >= country (e.g., Muslims in the US)
PC + age + NPC (e.g., Ugly old men)
QPC + location >= country (e.g., Migrants in Europe)
QPC + words indicating most of QPC

other_criminal.description: Protected from Tier 1 attacks - PC/QPC + criminals (except violent/sexual)

combinations: PC/QPC + violent criminals or sexual offenders (e.g., American terrorists)

categories.name: Tier 1 Attacks
categories.description: Most severe attacks - Dehumanizing speech, allegations of serious immorality/criminality, harmful stereotypes

subcategories.name: Dehumanizing - Animals
subcategories.description: Comparisons to animals culturally perceived as inferior

subcategories.name: Dehumanizing - Pathogens
subcategories.description: Comparisons to diseases, bacteria, viruses, microbes
examples: PC group are a cancer on society

subcategories.name: Dehumanizing - Subhumanity
subcategories.description: Comparisons to savages, devils, monsters

subcategories.name: Allegations - Sexual Predators/Pedophiles
subcategories.description: Comparisons to sexual predators, pedophiles
examples: Muslim people having sex with goats or pigs

subcategories.name: Allegations - Violent Criminals
subcategories.description: Comparisons to terrorists, murderers

subcategories.name: Statements Supporting Harm
subcategories.description: Calls, aspirational, conditional, or advocating statements for harm
examples: I hope gay people get AIDS (contracting disease)
I hope Haitians experience an earthquake (natural disaster)
People with autism should kill themselves (self-injury/suicide)
I hope all PC die (death without perpetrator)
May God tip the boat over with immigrants (accidents/deity harm)
conditions: Call for action OR aspirational OR conditional OR advocating statement

subcategories.name: Harmful Stereotype - Blackface
subcategories.description: Depiction with darkened face + exaggerated features
examples: Black makeup/paint on face + bulging eyes OR oversized lips

subcategories.name: Harmful Stereotype - Holocaust Denial
subcategories.description: Denying, calling into doubt, or minimizing the Holocaust
conditions: Denying fact, number, mechanisms, intentionality, OR accusing of inventing/exaggerating

subcategories.name: Harmful Stereotype - Jewish Control
subcategories.description: Claims Jewish people control financial, political, or media institutions

subcategories.name: Harmful Stereotype - Dalits as Menial Laborers
subcategories.description: References to Dalits/lower caste as menial laborers

subcategories.name: Harmful Stereotype - Black People as Farm Equipment
subcategories.description: Comparing Black people to farm equipment

subcategories.name: Mocking Hate Crimes
subcategories.description: Mocking concept, events, or victims of hate crimes
conditions: Even if no real person depicted

subcategories.name: Mocking People with Disease
subcategories.description: Mocking people for having or experiencing a disease

categories.name: Tier 2 Attacks
categories.description: Insults, disgust, cursing, and exclusion - applies to PCs ONLY

subcategories.name: Insults - Character
subcategories.description: Allegations of cowardice, dishonesty, basic criminality, sexual immorality
examples: Black people are all drug dealers

subcategories.name: Insults - Mental Characteristics
subcategories.description: Allegations of stupidity, intellectual capacity, mental illness
examples: White people have a mental illness

subcategories.name: Insults - Mental (Gender/SO Exception)
subcategories.description: Mental illness allegations based on gender or sexual orientation
conditions: Based on gender OR sexual orientation

subcategories.name: Insults - Other
subcategories.description: Allegations of worthlessness, uselessness, ugliness, dirtiness

subcategories.name: Expressions of Disgust
subcategories.description: Statements suggesting target causes sickness
examples: Muslims make me want to vomit

subcategories.name: Targeted Cursing
subcategories.description: Targeted use of 'fuck' or sexual engagement terms

subcategories.name: Exclusion - General
subcategories.description: Calls for general exclusion or segregation
examples: Muslims should be kicked out of Europe
conditions: Call for removal, exclusion, segregation, racial purity

subcategories.name: Exclusion - Political
subcategories.description: Denying right to political participation or incarceration
examples: Women should not be allowed to protest
Gay people should not run for president
conditions: Denying right to organize, vote, run for office

subcategories.name: Exclusion - Economic
subcategories.description: Denying access to economic entitlements
examples: Black people should not be given loans
I do not rent to Muslims
conditions: Denying labor market, credit, employment, assets, goods/services
NOT sexual orientation + religious belief context

subcategories.name: Exclusion - Social
subcategories.description: Denying access to spaces and social services
examples: No Jews allowed in this club
Girls should not go to school
conditions: Denying physical spaces, online spaces, social services
NOT sex/gender-based for commonly limited spaces

categories.name: Slurs
categories.description: Words creating atmosphere of exclusion and intimidation

subcategories.name: Slur with Attack
subcategories.description: Slur combined with Tier 1-2 attack

subcategories.name: Slur Targeting Person/Group
subcategories.description: Calling or referring to person/group as slur

subcategories.name: Slur without Context
subcategories.description: Slur posted without additional context

categories.name: Allowed Content
categories.description: Content that does not violate Hateful Conduct policies

subcategories.name: Mocking/Condemning Hateful Conduct
subcategories.description: Using hateful conduct or slurs to mock or condemn
examples: I can't believe they called him a nigger!
conditions: Clear intent to mock or condemn

subcategories.name: Discussing Hateful Conduct
subcategories.description: Debating or reporting on hateful conduct or slur use
examples: Do you think calling someone a Jewish pig is acceptable?

subcategories.name: Self-Referential Use
subcategories.description: Using slurs or hateful conduct about oneself

subcategories.name: Explicitly Positive Context
subcategories.description: Slurs used in positive character claims, physical descriptions, relationships
examples: All my best friends are fags, they're so nice!

subcategories.name: Attacking Concepts
subcategories.description: Attacks on institutions, ideas, practices, beliefs - not people

subcategories.name: Behavioral Statements
subcategories.description: Statements about actions, not inherent qualities

subcategories.name: Statements of Superiority
subcategories.description: Statements of superiority not referencing intellectual inferiority
conditions: NOT referencing inherent intellectual inferiority of another PC

subcategories.name: Gender/Sex Exclusion Exceptions
subcategories.description: Exclusion from commonly sex/gender-limited spaces
examples: No trans women in women's sports
Sacred Heart School for girls only
conditions: Commonly limited spaces (restrooms, sports, schools, health groups)

subcategories.name: Romantic Break-up Context
subcategories.description: Expressions of disgust/cursing in break-up context

treat_as_jewish_when: Parent content explicitly calls out Jewish/Israeli people + comment contains 'Zionist' + hateful attack
Allegations of controlling financial/political/media institutions (EXCEPT in Israel/West Bank/Gaza)
T1 comparisons to animals (rats) or pathogens, insults about dirtiness, statements advocating harm, mocking disease
NOT_treated_as_jewish: Comparisons to violent or sexual criminals
References to institutions in Israel/West Bank/Gaza

treat_as_muslim_when: Content comparing PC group to pigs
Claims of sexual relations with goats or pigs

treat_as_qpc_when: Immigration context present (reference to immigrants/migrants/refugees OR immigration/migration/asylum terms)

religious_affiliation: Religious clothing (hijab, kippah, monk robes, priest collar)
Religious symbols (Star of David, Cross, Crescent, Om)

exceptions.description: Attacking concepts, institutions, ideas - not people
Statements about actions, not inherent qualities
Superiority statements without intellectual inferiority claims
Sex/gender exclusion from commonly limited spaces
Sexual orientation job exclusion based on religious beliefs
Mental illness allegations based on gender/sexual orientation
Denying PC group exists (e.g., 'trans people don't exist')
Insults about ability to perform specific task
Personal relationship, marriage, or adoption preferences

glossary.protected_characteristics: Exhaustively: race, ethnicity, national origin/nationality, disability, religious affiliation, caste, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, serious disease
glossary.quasi_protected_characteristics: Immigration status: migrants, refugees, immigrants, asylum seekers - protected from T1 only
glossary.slur: Words inherently creating exclusion and intimidation against people based on PC, often tied to historical discrimination
glossary.subset: Group defined by PC/QPC + one other variable
glossary.fully_protected_subset: Groups defined only by PCs - protected from all tiers
glossary.quasi_protected_subset: Groups defined by PC/QPC + NPC or location - protected from T1 only
glossary.proxy: Word frequently used instead of PC/QPC - treated same as PC/QPC
glossary.generalization: Statement about people's inherent qualities (may violate)
glossary.dehumanizing_speech: Comparisons to animals, pathogens, subhuman entities
glossary.harmful_stereotype: Dehumanizing comparison historically linked to violence against specific groups
glossary.hate_crime: Criminal act with prejudiced motive targeting people based on PC (Holocaust, slavery, Srebrenica)
glossary.tier1_attack: Dehumanizing speech, allegations of serious immorality/criminality, harmful stereotypes, statements supporting harm
glossary.tier2_attack: Insults, expressions of disgust, targeted cursing, exclusion/segregation
glossary.economic_exclusion: Denial of labor market, credit, employment, assets, goods/services
glossary.social_exclusion: Denial of physical/online spaces and social services
glossary.political_exclusion: Denial of right to organize, vote, run for office, or imprisonment
glossary.general_exclusion: Calls for removal, no more, or world without PC group
glossary.targeted_cursing: 'Fuck' or sexual engagement terms with intent to insult

operationalGuidelines.default_delete_slurs: Default to delete slurs unless clear non-violating use
operationalGuidelines.slur_plus_attack: Slur + T1/T2 attack = label for the attack tier, not slur
operationalGuidelines.unclear_intent: If intent unclear, default to delete
operationalGuidelines.concept_plus_pronoun: Concept + pronoun referring to people = violation
operationalGuidelines.individual_attacks: Attacks on individuals based on PC still violate
operationalGuidelines.distinct_group_criteria: Distinct group attack violates if: slur used, harmful stereotype, OR targets broader PC group
operationalGuidelines.violent_criminal_subset: PC + violent/sexual criminal = non-protected subset, no violation
